verses.verse: יֹ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> He that dwelleth בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> in the secret עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> place of the most High בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> under the shadow שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> of the Almighty יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <WH3885> shall abide

אֹמַ֗ר <WH559> I will say לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> of the LORD מַחְסִ֣י <WH4268> [He is] my refuge וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> and my fortress אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> my God אֶבְטַח־ <WH982> in him will I trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ה֣וּא <WH1931> who יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <WH5337> Surely he shall deliver מִפַּ֥ח <WH6341> thee from the snare יָק֗וּשׁ <WH3353> of the fowler מִדֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> pestilence הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> [and] from the noisome

בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ ׀ <WH84> thee with his feathers יָ֣סֶךְ <WH5526> He shall cover לָ֭ךְ וְתַֽחַת־ <WH8478> and under כְּנָפָ֣יו <WH3671> and under his wings תֶּחְסֶ֑ה <WH2620> shalt thou trust צִנָּ֖ה <WH6793> [shall be thy] shield וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה <WH5507> and buckler אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH571> his truth

לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִ֭ירָא <WH3372> Thou shalt not be afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <WH6343> for the terror לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <WH2671> [nor] for the arrow יָע֥וּף <WH5774> [that] flieth יוֹמָֽם׃ <WH3119> by day

מִ֭דֶּבֶר <WH1698> [Nor] for the pestilence בָּאֹ֣פֶל <WH652> in darkness יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> [that] walketh מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <WH6986> [nor] for the destruction יָשׁ֥וּד <WH7736> [that] wasteth צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> at noonday

יִפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> shall fall מִצִּדְּךָ֨ ׀ <WH6654> at thy side אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> A thousand וּרְבָבָ֥ה <WH7233> and ten thousand מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> at thy right hand אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> about לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <WH5066> [but] it shall not come nigh
רַ֭ק <WH7535> with בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> Only with thine eyes תַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> shalt thou behold וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <WH8011> the reward רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> and see

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> [which is] my refuge עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> [even] the most High שַׂ֣מְתָּ <WH7760> Because thou hast made מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <WH4583> thy habitation

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <WH579> befall אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> There shall no evil וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <WH5061> thee neither shall any plague לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> come nigh בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <WH168> thy dwelling

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מַ֭לְאָכָיו <WH4397> For he shall give his angels יְצַוֶּה־ <WH6680> charge לָּ֑ךְ לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ <WH8104> over thee to keep בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1870> thee in all thy ways

עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּפַּ֥יִם <WH3709> in [their] hands יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <WH5375> They shall bear thee up פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תִּגֹּ֖ף <WH5062> lest thou dash בָּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> against a stone רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH7272> thy foot

עַל־ <WH5921> upon שַׁ֣חַל <WH7826> upon the lion וָפֶ֣תֶן <WH6620> and adder תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <WH1869> Thou shalt tread תִּרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> shalt thou trample under feet כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> the young lion וְתַנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> and the dragon

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because בִ֣י חָ֭שַׁק <WH2836> Because he hath set his love וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <WH6403> upon me therefore will I deliver אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ <WH7682> him I will set him on high כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> because he hath known שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> my name

יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי ׀ <WH7121> He shall call וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <WH6030> upon me and I will answer עִמּֽוֹ־ <WH5973> will be with אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> him בְצָרָ֑ה <WH6869> him I [will be] with him in trouble אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <WH2502> I will deliver וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3513> him and honour
אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> With long יָ֭מִים <WH3117> life אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <WH7646> will I satisfy וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <WH7200> him and shew בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> him my salvation
